item.title: What Trump's 'drill, baby, drill' fracking agenda could look like
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump's second term could bring reform to energy permitting and increased fracking on federal lands.

item.title: House Republicans grill FEMA administrator over alleged political bias

item.title: Gaetz sent $10K in payments to 2 women who testified in House probe, records suggest
item.description: The House Ethics Committee has records showing Matt Gaetz allegedly paid more than $10,000 to two women who later testified in front of the panel, ABC...

item.title: What will be the US military's role in Trump's mass deportation plan?
item.description: Thomas Homan, Trump's choice to serve as the border czar, said U.S. military assets would be a "force multiplier" in the deportations.

item.title: Ethics Committee to meet, but it's not clear if vote on Gaetz report is on its agenda
